archimate:Node.name: [L1 Base] Spectrograph Forwarder Nodes (Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: Forwarder nodes acquire the pixel data. The software design provides for forwarders to "die" -- as they are seleected from a pool (in thsi case for every image). A Robust spectrogaph deployment might have two forwarders to provide continuous service shodl a forwarder node fail. For the spectrograph, forwarding nodes only perform the Archiving function.
